text: Elon Musk founded SpaceX in 2002.
Apple Inc. was founded by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne.
The capital of France is Paris.
Google was founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin.
Apple introduced the iPhone in 2007, created under the leadership of Steve Jobs.
Microsoft was founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen in 1975.
Tesla was founded in 2003, with Elon Musk as an early investor and later CEO.
Amazon was founded in 1994 by Jeff Bezos as an online bookstore.
OpenAI released ChatGPT to the public in November 2022.
NVIDIA is a leading company in GPUs, founded in 1993 by Jensen Huang, Chris Malachowsky, and Curtis Priem.
Bitcoin, the first cryptocurrency, was introduced in 2009 by Satoshi Nakamoto.
Ethereum was proposed in 2013 by Vitalik Buterin and launched in 2015.
The United Nations was founded in 1945 after World War II.
The COVID-19 pandemic began in late 2019, caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
The iPad was first released by Apple in 2010.
Google acquired YouTube in 2006 for $1.65 billion in stock.
Facebook, now Meta, was founded in 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg and fellow Harvard students.
Instagram was acquired by Facebook in 2012 for approximately $1 billion.
India gained independence from British rule on August 15, 1947.
The Euro became the official currency of 11 European countries in 1999.
ChatGPT is built on OpenAI's GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 language models.
Claude AI is developed by Anthropic as a safer AI assistant.
Threads by Meta launched in July 2023 as a Twitter competitor.
X, formerly Twitter, was acquired by Elon Musk in October 2022 for $44 billion.
The FIFA World Cup 2022 was hosted by Qatar, with Argentina winning the tournament.
Lionel Messi won the Golden Ball award at the FIFA World Cup 2022.
India successfully landed Chandrayaan-3 on the Moon in 2023, near the lunar south pole.
ISRO launched Aditya-L1 in 2023 as India's first solar observatory mission.
The iPhone 15 series was released by Apple in September 2023.
Microsoft acquired LinkedIn in 2016 for $26.2 billion.
Microsoft acquired GitHub in 2018 for $7.5 billion.
The global AI market size surpassed $200 billion in 2023 and continues growing rapidly.
The Indian stock market's Sensex index crossed 70,000 points in December 2023.
Sam Altman is the CEO of OpenAI as of 2024.
Google Bard is a conversational AI developed by Google, released in 2023.
Microsoft Copilot integrates AI into Office tools like Word and Excel, announced in 2023.
India hosted the G20 summit in New Delhi in September 2023.
The Russo-Ukrainian War escalated in 2022 when Russia launched a full-scale invasion.
The iPhone SE (3rd generation) was released by Apple in 2022.
Claude 2, Anthropic's advanced model, launched in 2023.
Apple Vision Pro, a mixed reality headset, was announced in June 2023.
India won the 2023 Asia Cup cricket tournament.
